refresher.title: Time to Build Something Real!
refresher.content:
# Final Project: React Gym Todo Pro

You've mastered all the tools. Now combine them into a production-quality app!

## Requirements

Build a full-featured todo app with:

- User authentication (login/register)
- Protected routes
- Persistent todos (localStorage)
- Context + useReducer for state
- Lazy loading for heavy pages
- At least 5 tests
- Dark mode toggle
- Responsive design
- Modals for edit/delete confirm

**This is your portfolio piece. Make it shine! ‚ú®**
